title: Dark Canvas 2 - Blood and Stone CE [FINAL] 2013 (PC) Foxy Games
description:
_________________________________________________________________
|*****************************************************************|
|** Dark Canvas 2: Blood and Stone Colector's Edition ************|
|** *** FINAL * 2013 *PC* Hidden Object *** Foxy Games ***********|
|*****************************************************************|
|** * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * **|
|*****************************************************************|
|** Description:  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * **|
|*****************************************************************|
|** Who used the encasing device in the grisly murder           **|
|** of the Sculptor and his bride? What loathsome secrets       **|
|** are hiding behind the high walls of elegant,                **|
|** Grecian estates? Explore a beautiful and romantic Greek     **|
|** village by the sea, as you use your investigative reporting **|
|** it all sounds so simple!                                    **|
|** skills to track down a desperate,                           **|
|** haunted killer before they kill again!                      **|
